Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Maximin 1  (natural AMPs; UCLL1c; XXA; toad, amphibians, animals; ZZS)
Sequence Information.Source: Chinese red belly toad,Bombina maxima, Yunnan, China, Asia

Literature Information.Literature: Activity:  Active against E. coli ATCC25922 (MIC 19.5 ug/ml), S. aureus ATCC2592 (MIC 19.5 ug/ml), B. pyocyaneus CMCCB10104 (MIC 19.5 ug/ml), B. megatherium (MIC 19.5 ug/ml),  K. pneumoniae (MIC 9 ug/ml), B. dysenterium (MIC 2.7 uM), C. albicans ATCC2002 (MIC 3 uM), A.flavus IFFI4015 (ND), and P.uticale IFFI2001 (ND).It also has spermicidal effect.active against cancer cells C8166, Molt-4, BIU-4, and T24 (IC50 15-35 ug/ml).EC50 against HIV-1 is 21.4 ug/ml(Lai R et al., 2012).Structure:  Its NMR structure was determined in 50% TFE by 2D NMR. Residues 2-26 are helical (Timmons and Hewage, 2021).You can rotate, zoom, and view the 3D structureherein the PDB. Swiss ID: P83080. Updated 2/2012; 12/2015; 10/2021 GW
Literature Information.Author: Lai R, Zheng Y-T, Shen J-H, Liu GJ, Liu H, Lee W-H, Tang S-Z., Zhang Y.2002.
Literature Information.Title: Antimicrobial peptides from skin secretions of Chinese red belly toad Bombina maxima.
